entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Light snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023
